definition: first month of the lunar year
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
New Year's Day in the lunar calendar

sentences.english: First of all, may I extend my new year  greetings to all of you, because according to Chinese lunar calendar, today is the 10th day of the first month of the Year of the Tiger.
sentences.chinese: 今天是中國農曆虎年正月初十，我先給大家拜個晚年。

sentences.english: In the Han Emperor, has been ordered fifteenth day as the Lantern Festival.
sentences.chinese: 在漢文帝時，已下令將正月十五定爲元宵節。

sentences.english: And in the fourteenth day of the first month is the passover of the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 正月十四日是耶和華的逾越節。

sentences.english: Year "Xin Zheng, " which means "the new, first month. "
sentences.chinese: 廈門人把農曆新一年的正月稱爲“新正”。

sentences.english: Its date is in lunar calendar on first lunar month 29.
sentences.chinese: 它的日子是在農曆的正月廿九日。

sentences.english: Another legend says that the practice of hanging red lanterns has something to do with Huang Chao, leader of a peasant uprising.
sentences.chinese: 還有人說，正月十五掛紅燈和農民起義領袖黃巢有關。

sentences.english: Of the children of Perez was the chief of all the captains of the host for the first month.
sentences.chinese: 他是法勒斯的子孫，統管正月班的一切軍長。

sentences.english: And the children of the captivity kept the passover upon the fourteenth day of the first month.
sentences.chinese: 正月十四日，被擄歸回的人守逾越節。

sentences.english: And the children of Israel of the captivity kept the phase, on the fourteenth day of the first month.
sentences.chinese: 由充軍歸來的子民，於正月十四日，舉行了逾越節。

sentences.english: Length of the first month for December, and so Month-end call.
sentences.chinese: 正月爲十二月之長，所以又叫端月。

sentences.english: Solving riddles on lanterns has been a popular tradition since the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 正月十五賞花燈是元宵節必有的另一項習俗。

sentences.english: On the second day of the New Year, Chin and her motherarrived.
sentences.chinese: 舊曆正月初二日琴跟着她的母親來拜年。

sentences.english: In the first month of the first year of his reign, he opened the doors of the temple of the Lord and repaired them.
sentences.chinese: 元年正月，開了耶和華殿的門，重新修理。

sentences.english: The ten day round in early may, throughout all huan.
sentences.chinese: 正月十五月初圓，神州大地人人歡。

sentences.english: The following year the first month to establish Dashun regime era name Yongchang.
sentences.chinese: 次年正月，建立大順政權，年號永昌。

sentences.english: In charge of the first division, for the first month, was Jashobeam son of Zabdiel.
sentences.chinese: 正月第一班的班長是撒巴第業的兒子雅朔班。

definition: New Year's Day in the lunar calendar
old calendar/the Chinese lunar calendar/same as 農曆|农历[nong2 li4]
the traditional Chinese calendar/the lunar calendar
first day of the lunar month
